description.value: Action Cost: 1 [Combat] action Range: Touch Effect: Touch a dying creature (at 0 HP or negative HP). They automatically stabilize at 0 HP. Additionally, for 1 minute, they subtract 1 from both dice on all stabilization attempts and cannot die from reaching negative HP equal to their Constitution (death threshold suspended). You ease their passage, giving them a chance to cling to life. Usage: Uses 1 Channel Divinity
